title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 382.10 - General requirement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 382.10 - General requirement

State Regulations

Land disposal facilities must be sited, designed, operated, closed, and controlled after closure to reasonably assure that
exposures to humans are within the limits established in the performance
objectives in sections 382.11 through
382.15
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
382.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
